creator: Bambooapps
descriptionHtml:
Stop! You are faced with a powerful app with all the necessary tools for translation!
Do you want to convert audio to text for translation?
Do you want to upload and translate your PDF or doc file?
Do you want to save the translated audio and text in the favorites list or download it to your phone?
Are you looking for a powerful dictionary with support for all languages?
Language translator, Free Translation Voice & Text is completely free and useful for all android users.
Speech and translates more than 90 languages by using free voice translator app.

✨ Features:
👉 Translate words and sentences
👉 Suggestions Words and sentences(different languages)
👉 Speak and translate text
👉 Listen to translated text
👉 Easily copy and paste text
👉 Share translated text with your friends
👉 Multi-language dictionary
👉 Free Translate more than 90 language
👉 Its interface is very simple and easy to use
👉 Add translations to favorites and working offline mode
👉 View the favorite and history of your translations.
👉 backup and restore of your translations.
👉 Export language translate to text file
👉 Import text/PDF file for translation
👉 Google Translate Voice File Download

App localized in multiple languages for the better user experience, now download Speak and Translate and explore the world with the language skills & enjoy speak and translate.

📮Suggestion is always welcomed .If you have any suggestions, please contact us: bambooco2020@gmail.com
